trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para eventos de teclado.

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento de teclado existente nos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usa o KeyboardEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventArgs serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes, which are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventArgs serve como a classe base para o mais específico <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>classes de dados de evento, que são usados por existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de teclado lógico associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que ocorreu a entrada.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca manipuladores de eventos de uma maneira de um tipo específico, que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação converte o manipulador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>e, em seguida, invoca o proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre esse padrão de implementação e os motivos para ele, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>e [visão geral sobre eventos roteados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador genérico para chamar em uma forma de um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino para chamar o manipulador no.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard device associated with the input event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo de teclado associado ao evento de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de teclado lógico associado ao evento.
